name: Brutal Doom: Kickass Edition
summary: Brutal Doom: Kickass Edition is (or Was) A Brutal Doom Fork by Coomslayer15/D Boi, Enhancing Gameplay, making it much more challenging, redesigning the weapons and adding new features to the pre-existing Brutal Doom format
